text: @NYGovCuomo Why didn’t your brother, Fredo, of cnn wear a mask 😷 when you was Covid-19 positive? He threatened people that called him out too bc Fredo is so tough lol Different rules for you, the fam and elites? Instead, you and Fredo were joking on air as thousands died under your watch!
